Translations.Text: Jevha akasa vidirna ho'ila
Ani apalya palanakartyaca adesa kana lavuna aikela, ani tyala tase karane bhaga ahe
Ani jevha jaminila (khecuna) pasaravile ja'ila
Ani ticyata je ahe te okuna bahera kadhila ani agadi khali ho'ila
Ani apalya palanakartyaca adesa kana lavuna aikela ani ti tyasa patra ahe
He manava! Tu apalya palanakartyasi bheta ho'iparyanta he prayatna ani sarva karya ani parisrama karuna tyaci bheta ghenara ahesa
Tara tya veli jya manasacya ujavya hatata karma-patra dile ja'ila
Tyaca hisoba mothya sahajatene ghetala ja'ila
Ani to apalya kutumbiyankade anandita ho'una parata ja'ila
Parantu jya manasace karma-patra tyacya pathimaguna dile ja'ila
Tevha to mrtyula bolavu lagela
Ani bhadakatya jahannamamadhye dakhala ho'ila
Ha manusya apalya kutumbata (jagata) anandita hota
To samajata hota ki allahakade paratuna janaraca nahi
He kase sakya ahe, vastavika tyaca palanakarta tyala cangalya prakare pahata hota
Mala sandhyakalacya lalimeci sapatha
Ani ratrici ani tine gola kelelya vastunci sapatha
Ani purna candraci sapatha
Nihsansaya, tumhi eka avasthetuna dusarya avastheta pohocala
Tyanna jhale tari kaya ki imana rakhata nahita
Ani jevha tyancyasamora kura'ana vacale jate, tevha sajada karita nahita
Kimbahuna tyanni kupra (inkara) kela, te khote tharavita aheta
Ani he je kahi manata thevatata, allaha te cangalya prakare janato
Tevha tumhi tyanna duhkhadayaka siksa yatananci khusakhabara dya
Tathapi imana rakhanarya neka sadacari lokanna aganita ani kadhihi na sampanara mobadala pradana kela ja'ila
Burujanvalya akasaci sapatha
Vayada kelelya divasaci sapatha
Hajara honarya ani hajara kelya gelelyaci sapatha
(Ki) khandakavalyanca sarvanasa kela gela
Ti eka aga hoti indhanaci
Jevha te loka ticya javalapasa basale hote
Ani imanadharakansi je karita hote, te apalya samora pahata hote
He loka tya imanadharakancya an'ya ekhadya aparadhaca suda gheta navhate, yakherija ki tyanni varcasvasali, sarva prasansesa patra asa allahavara imana rakhale hote
Jyacyasathi akasa ani dharatice samrajya va rajyasatta ahe ani pratyeka vastu sarvasrestha allahasamora ahe
Nihsansaya, jya lokanni imanadharaka purusanna va striyanna satavile, maga maphihi magitali nahi tara tyancyasathi jahannamaci siksa-yatana ahe ani jalanyaci siksa
Nihsansaya, imana kabula karanaryankarita ani satkarma karanaryankarita tya baga ahe, jyancya khali pravaha vahata aheta. Hica mothi saphalata ahe
Nihsansaya, tumacya palanakartyaci pakada mothi sakta ahe
Toca pahilyanda nirmana karato ani toca dusaryanda jivanta karila
To motha mapha karanara ani khupa sneha-prema karanara ahe
Arsaca svami, atyadhika mahanata rakhanara
Je icchila te karuna takanara ahe
Kaya tumhala laskaranci batamihi milali ahe
(Arthata) phira'auna ani samudaci
Khare tara he inkari loka khote tharavinyacyaca mage lagale aheta
Ani sarvasrestha allahanehi tyanna sagalikaduna gherale ahe
Kimbahuna ha kura'ana mothi sana vaibhava (prasansa) rakhanara ahe

Sapatha ahe akasaci ani andharata prakata honaryaci
Tumhala kaya mahita ki to ratri prakata honara kaya ahe
To eka tejasvi tara ahe
Asa konihi nahi, jyacyavara sanraksaka pharista (niyukta) nasela
Manasane vicara kela pahije ki tyala konatya vastupasuna nirmana kele gele ahe
Tyala eka usalatya panyapasuna nirmana kele gele ahe
Je patha ani chati yancya daramyani bhagatuna nighate
Nihsansaya, to (allaha) tyala parata ananyavara niscitaca samarthya rakhanara ahe
Jya divasi gupta rahasyabhedanci janca-padatala keli ja'ila
Tevha tyaca na kahi jora calela ani na koni madatakarta asela
Parjan'yavrsti karanarya akasaci sapatha
Ani dubhanganarya jaminici sapatha
Nihsansaya, ha (kura'ana) katekora phaisala karanari bhasa ahe
Hi hasya-vinodaci (ani nirarthaka) gosta nahi
Tathapi inkari loka kata - karasthana karita aheta
Ani mi dekhila eka dava calata ahe
Tumhi ya inkari lokanna savada de'una taka, tyanna kahi divasa mokalika dya
